title: Darts
content:
on attack rolls with Darts while Threatened.

Many Darts have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Darts in BG3. This Weapon Action is Brace (Ranged).

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Darts Flails Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pikes Quarterstaves Rapier
